name: Ballz.js
description:
Ballz. Thats it. 

Controls are displayed ingame.

Minor mobile support.

(Program I made using the p5.js (https://p5js.org) library . Conversion of "balltestprogram" (See downloads) which was made using Processing (https://processing.org). I recommend it to anyone looking to get into programming, it's really easy to work with after you know what you're doing.)
